name: Speech Racer - Final Version 🚀
description:
The  game won't work on Firefox, play it on Chrome or other browsers ----------- 🤩 Play on full screen 📺 Video of actual gameplay (french)

You should never have trusted this person. This land is not really known for being inhabited by honest peoples.

The ship was really cheap but now, nothing responds to your orders and you have not even left the city. You triggered the city defenses by your drunk driving style and the ship is out of control !

Even the coffee maker is out of service ; you pray you won't have to use the toilet. Everythings seems lost ... 

Until you found the last functional thing : your old keyboard ⌨ ! Your last chance is to type your orders to your ship with this thing.

Just hope it will work !...

👩‍💻👩‍💻 A game by Tieffeline and Menica Folden 🇫🇷

Corrected version of the one made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Debug list :
-You have now 3 lives before dying
-You can pass each text during the intro one by one 
-Adjustment of all timers
-Difficulty scales by x1.4 when you came back to Night City
-All worlds have now their own projectiles, it was an animation frame bug 
-Correction of the typo during the introduction
-Correction of the barrel roll coming just after the hyperspace bug 
-Chronometer now count real secondes
